author: Staff Reporter
text:
A legal awareness campaign for ex-servicemen and their family members will be held at the Kuzhithurai court campus at 4.30 p.m. on February 20, says a release from Major (Retired) V. S. Jayakumrar, Deputy Director, Ex-servicemen Welfare, Nagercoil.

The release said that the camp would be organised by the District Legal Services Authorities on the instructions from the National Legal Services Authorities, New Delhi, said the release.
title: Legal awareness campaign for ex-servicemen on Feb. 20
